profile.title: Profaili ea Mosebelisi
profile.mustLogin: O tlameha ho kena ho bona litlhophiso.
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Bontša ea pele le e fetoletsoeng
profile.showOriginalAndTranslation: Bontša ea pele haufi le phetolelo
profile.noPrivateKey: Ha ho senotlolo sa lekunutu sesebedisong sena sa ho romela.
profile.importSuccess: Senotlolo sa lekunutu se kentsoe sesebedisong sena.
profile.importFailed: Ho kenya ho hlolehile (phasewete e fosahetseng kapa faele e senyehileng).
profile.keysRotated: Lipara tse ncha tsa linotlolo li entsoe, senotlolo sa sechaba se rometsoe.
profile.importKey: Kenya bekapo ea senotlolo e enkriptiloeng
profile.keyDisclaimer: Senotlolo sa hau sa lekunutu ha se tlohe sesebelisoa sena. Romela kopi e sirelelitsoeng ka phasewete ho e tsosolosa sesebelisong se seng.
profile.themeFreeNotice: U ho Free—sebelisa likhetho tsa Letsatsi/Khanya le Bosiu ka tlase. Ntlafatsa ho notlolla lihlooho tse ling.
profile.backupTitle: Libekapo tse Enkriptiloeng le Sinkroniseishene ea Lisebeliso
profile.backupDesc: Etsa libekapo tse sirelelitsoeng ka phasewete tsa linotlolo tsa hau, ’me u li tsosolose sesebelisong se seng ho li hokahanya.
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Fifatsa ha app e sa sebelisoe
profile.notifyOnCopy: Ntlalose ha molaetsa oa ka o kopitsoa
profile.unfollowFailed: Ho khaotsa ho latela ho hlolehile
profile.followHint: Lipale tsa bona li tla hlaha phallong ea Hao ea ho Latela ha ba beha ka bamameli ba Balateli (kapa Phatlalatsa).
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Ho na le phoso karolong ena.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Fetisetsa mehala le melaetsa e kenang ho mohala kapa imeile e netefalitsoeng. Mehala/melaetsa e tsoang e ka bontša nomoro ea hau ea Chatforia.
profile.destinationPhone: Mohala oo e eang ho oona (E.164)
profile.destinationEmail: Imeile eo e eang ho eona
profile.forwardSaved: Litlhophiso tsa ho fetisetsa li bolokiloe
profile.errE164: Kenya nomoro e nepahetseng ea E.164 (mohl. +15551234567).
profile.errSmsDest: Khetha bonyane sebaka se le seng (mohala kapa imeile).
profile.errQuietHours: Lihora tsa khutso li tlameha ho ba pakeng tsa 0 le 23.

chat.selectPrompt: Khetha mongolo kapa phaposi ea puisano ho qala ho qoqa

status.filesNote: Ho fihla ho lifaele tse 5. E fela ka lihora tse 24 ka boiketsetso.

premium.heading: E-ba Premium
premium.description: Notlolla likarolo tsa matla le tlosa lipapatso.

auth.headline: Melaetsa e sireletsehileng, ea lefats'e ka phetolelo hang-hang
auth.description: E2E encryption, phetolelo e tsamaisoang ke AI, melaetsa e nyamelang, le mehala ea lentsoe/video.

feature.disappearing: Melaetsa e nyamelang le litsebiso tsa ho baloa
feature.privacy: Lekunutu pele. Lintlha tsa hau, taolo ea hau.

auth.desktopTip: Ho desktop? Skena ka fono ho fumana app.

headlineAlt.main: Mosebeletsi oa melaetsa o sireletsehileng ea

auth.subhead: Melaetsa e poraefete, e enkriptiloeng, e fetoletsoeng — hang-hang.
auth.tip: U ka sebelisa Chatforia sesebelisoa sefe kapa sefe — kapa jarolla app bakeng sa boiphihlelo bo botle.
auth.qrAlt: Khoutu ea QR bakeng sa Chatforia
auth.scanHint: Skena ho jarolla app kapa ho bula ka sebatli.

footer.doNotSell: Se ke oa Rekisa Boitsebiso ba Ka

press.title: Bohatisi
press.contact: Bakeng sa lipotso tsa boralitaba, re ngolle ho press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: Bakeng sa lipotso tsa boralitaba, re ngolle ho press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia ke mosebeletsi oa melaetsa o sireletsehileng ka phetolelo hang-hang le E2E encryption, o etselitsoeng ho etsa hore lipuisano tsa lefats'e e be poraefete ebile li be bonolo.
press.assetsText: Lologo, li-screenshot, le litšoantšo tsa sehlahisoa (li tla tla kapele).

careers.title: Mesebetsi
careers.intro: Re sehlopha se senyenyane se hahang mosebeletsi oa melaetsa oa lefatše ka bophara. Haeba u tsotella encryption, phihlello, le UX e monate, re rata ho u utloa.
careers.openRoles: Mekhoa e bulehileng: Boenjiniere (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Sehlahisoa, Ts'ehetso.
careers.apply: Tsela ea ho etsa kopo: Re romelle CV/lihokelo ho jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Ka Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia ke mosebeletsi oa melaetsa o sireletsehileng, o buang lipuo tse ngata ka E2E encryption, phetolelo hang-hang, le mehala ea lentsoe/video. Morero oa rona o bonolo: ho thusa batho ho hokahana—ka poraefete, ka polokeho, le ho pholletsa le lipuo.

values.access: Phetolelo ka bohona lipuo tse 100+.
values.control: Melaetsa e nyamelang le litsebiso tsa ho baloa lia ikhethela.

about.howDescription: Melaetsa e enkriptiloa sesebelisong sa hau pele e tloha. Phetolelo, libekapo, le sinkroniseishene li etselitsoe ho fokotsa seo li-server tsa rona li ka se bonang.

advertise.title: Bapatsa ka Chatforia
advertise.description: Fihla ho basebelisi ba sebetsang ka lipapatso tse hlomphehang, tse sireletsehileng. Re fana ka libaka tsa banner tse bonahalang, bots'epehi, le li-sponsorship. Basebelisi ba Premium ha ba bone lipapatso.

adsense.withPubId: Hajoale re fana ka lipapatso ka Google AdSense. Haeba u batla ho re lebisa ka Google Ads, sebelisoa ID ea mohlomi {{pubId}} ’me u kope managed placement ho diyuniti tse ka tlaase. Ho teng le li-deal tse tobileng—sebelisa foromo.
adsense.noPubId: Hajoale re fana ka lipapatso ka Google AdSense. Li-sponsorship tse tobileng le tsona lia fumaneha—sebelisa foromo e ka tlaase.

advertise.noPlacements: Ha ho libaka tse hlophisitsoeng hajoale. Kenya tsona ho ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Maqhubu a phahameng a lipuisano le nako e telele ho UI ea puisano
why.brandSafe: Mefuta e bolokehileng bakeng sa brand; ho fokotsa makhetlo a lipapatso
why.sponsoredMoments: Lintho tse tšehetsoang (mohl., “Qala Puisano”) lia fumaneha
why.deals: Likamano tse tobileng kapa ka lenaneo ka AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Kea leboha! Potso ea hau e se e rometsoe. Re tla ikopanya haufinyane.
form.missingRequired: Ka kopo tlatsa lebitso, imeile, le molaetsa.
form.successToast: Kea leboha! Re tla ikopanya haufinyane.
form.mailtoInfo: Re bula moreki oa imeile ho romela potso…
form.messageLabel: Re bolelle ka letšolo la hau
form.messagePlaceholder: Sepheo, matsatsi, KPI, likhetho tsa libaka…

upgrade.title: Ntlafatsa
upgrade.subtitle: Khetholla morero o u tšoanelang: tlosa lipapatso ka Plus, kapa fumana likarolo tsohle ka Premium.

scheduleBanner.title: Setho se tla fela
scheduleBanner.body: U tla khutlela ho Free ka

premiumMonthly.title: Premium (Khoeli le Khoeli)

features.ringtones: Lithoko tsa mohala le melumo ea melaetsa tsa moetlo

premiumMonthly.badge: Boleng bo botle ka ho fetisisa

features.save25: Boloka ~25% ho feta khoeli le khoeli
features.sameFeatures: Likarolo tse tšoanang le Khoeli le Khoeli

gettingStarted.title: Ho Qala
gettingStarted.subtitle: U mocha ho Chatforia? Tataiso ena e potlakileng e u bontša lintho tsa bohlokoa hore u sebetse ka metsotso.

alert.text: Tataiso ena e tla hola ha re tsebisa likarolo tse ncha. Haeba ho haella ho hong, re tsebise ka

section1.title: 1) Etsa ak'haonte
section1.loginText: ka ak'haonte ea hau e seng e le teng.

section2.title: 2) Qala ho romellana melaetsa
section2.item1: Etsa DM kapa Sehlopha 'me u romele molaetsa oa hau oa pele.
section2.item2: Sebelisa phetolelo hang-hang ho qoqa ka lipuo tse 100+.
section2.item3: Leka melaetsa e nyamelang le litsebiso tsa ho baloa ho Profaili → Lekunutu.

section3.title: 3) Eya pele
section3.item1Part2: (Plus = ha ho lipapatso, Premium = likarolo tsohle).
section3.item2Part1: Hokahanya lisebelisoa tse eketsehileng 'me u hlophise libekapo tse enkriptiloeng ho

account.q: Ke etsa joang kapa ke khutlisa ak'haonte ea ka?
account.a: Jarolla app kapa sebelisa web, tobetsa “Etsa ak'haonte”, netefatsa imeile/mohala. Ho khutlisa, sebelisa “U lebetse phasewete”.

privacy.q: Na melaetsa e enkriptiloe ka lipheletsong ka bobeli?
privacy.a: Ee. Melaetsa le mehala li enkriptiloe ka lipheletsong ka boiketsetso. Ke wena le moamoheli feela ba ka e balang.

translate.a: Bulela “Fetolela ka bohona” ho Litlhophiso → Ponahalo & Puo. Re fetolela sesebelisong moo ho tšehetsoeng, ho seng joalo ka li-API tse sireletsehileng ka metadata e fokolang.

contact.a: Re ngolle ho support@chatforia.com. Kenyeletsa li-screenshot le mofuta oa app.

contact.title: Iteanye le Rona
contact.successMsg: Kea leboha—sehlopha sa rona se tla araba ka imeile.
contact.errorSend: Ha ea romella. Ka kopo romella imeile ho support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Leano lena la Lekunutu le hlalosa kamoo Chatforia (“rona”) re bokellang, re sebelisang, le ho arolelana tlhahisoleseling ha u sebelisa liapp le litšebeletso tsa rona. Re rala Chatforia ho fokotsa data eo re ka e bonang.

infoWeCollect.title: Tlhahisoleseling eo re e bokellang
infoWeCollect.account: Litsebo tsa ak'haonte (mohl., imeile/mohala) ho etsa le ho sireletsa ak'haonte ea hau.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Litaba tse enkriptiloeng (melaetsa/mehala) li E2E; re ke ke ra li bala.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Liphoso/ts'ebeliso joalo ka log tsa ho putlama, mofuta oa sesebelisoa, kapa tlhahlobo e akaretsang ho ntlafatsa ts'ebetso.

howWeUse.title: Kamor’a moo re e sebelisang
howWeUse.provide: Ho fana le ho sireletsa tšebeletso (auth, ho lemoha spam/pefo).
howWeUse.improve: Ho ntlafatsa likarolo (boleng ba phetolelo, ts'epahalo).

sharing.title: Kabo
sharing.body: Ha re rekise data ea botho. Re ka arolelana data e lekanyelitsoeng le balekane ba ts'ebetso (mohl., litsebiso, tlhahlobo) tlasa likonteraka tse thata.

rights.title: Litokelo tsa hau
rights.body: Ho latela sebaka sa hau (mohl., GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), u ka kopa ho fumana, ho lokisa, ho hlakola, kapa ho tlohela lits'ebetso tse itseng. Iteanye: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Polokelo ea data & tšireletso
retention.body: Re boloka feela seo se hlokahalang ho sebetsa tšebeletso 'me re sebelisa tšireletso ea maemo a indasteri. Litaba tsa E2E ha re na bokhoni ba ho li hlakola.

children.title: Bana
children.body: Chatforia ha e reretsoe bana ba ka tlase ho 13 (kapa ho latela molao oa lehae).

changes.title: Liphetoho
changes.body: Re tla beha lintlafatso mona 'me re ntlafatse letsatsi la “E ntlafalitsoe qetellong”.

intro.body: Ka ho sebelisa Chatforia u lumela melao ena. Haeba u sa e lumellane, se ke oa sebelisa tšebeletso.

accounts.title: Liak'haonte
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Fana ka tlhahisoleseling e nepahetseng 'me u boloke mabitso a hao a patala a sireletsehile.
accounts.itemResponsibility: U ikarabella bakeng sa seo se etsahalang ak'haonteng ea hau.

acceptableUse.title: Tšebeliso e amohelehang
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Se ke oa fana ka litaba tse seng molaong, tse hlekefetsang kapa tse hatellang; ha ho spam kapa tlhekefetso e iketsang.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Re ka emisa/khaola tšebeletso ka lebaka la tlolo.

yourContent.title: Litaba tsa hau
yourContent.body: U boloka litokelo tsa litaba tsa hau. U re fa litokelo tse hlokahalang ho sebetsa tšebeletso (mohl., ho tsamaisa, polokelo, phetolelo).

disclaimer.title: Temoso & boikarabelo
disclaimer.body: Tšebeletso e fanoa “joalo ka ha e le teng” ntle le liwaranti. Ho fihlela moo molao o lumellang, Chatforia ha e ikarabelle ka tšenyo e sa tobang kapa e bakoang.

changes.title: Liphetoho
changes.body: Re ka ntlafatsa melao; ts'ebeliso e tsoelang pele ka mor'a liphetoho e bolela kamohelo.

doNotSell.title: Se ke oa Rekisa kapa ho Arolelana Boitsebiso ba Ka
doNotSell.body: Chatforia ha e rekise tlhahisoleseling ea botho. Leha ho le joalo baahi ba California ba ka fana ka likopo tlas’a CPRA ka konopo e ka tlaase.

cookies.title: Litlhophiso tsa Li-cookie
cookies.body: Chatforia e sebelisa li-cookie tse fokolang (mohl., th-session, tšireletso). Ha re sebelise li-cookie tsa lipapatso tsa batho ba bang. Laola li-cookie ka litlhophiso tsa sebadi sa hau.

phoneNumberManager.unableToLoadStatus: Ha e khone ho jarolla boemo ba nomoro ea mohala.
phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Ha ho nomoro e abetsoeng. Khetha ka khoutu ea sebaka ho qala ho romella melaetsa.

startChatModal.title: Qala puisano
startChatModal.nameUsernamePhoneEmail: Thaepa lebitso, lebitso la mosebelisi, mohala, kapa imeile…
startChatModal.searchByUsernameOrPhone: Batla ka lebitso la mosebelisi kapa mohala
startChatModal.searchPrompt: Thaepa lebitso la mosebelisi kapa mohala ebe o tobetsa Batla.
startChatModal.pickAtLeastOne: Khetha bonyane moamoheli a le mong.
startChatModal.saveContactsHint: Litzeno tsa mohala/imeile li tla fumaneha kamora ho li boloka e le likopano.
startChatModal.failedBulkStart: Ho hlolehile ho qala puisano le bakamoheli ba khethiloeng.

sounds.freeNotice: U ho Free — melumo ea premium e bontšoa empa e notletsoe. Ntlafatsa ho notlolla tsohle.

premiumGuard.requiresPremium: Karolo ena e hloka morero oa Premium.

aiSettings.title: Litlhophiso tsa AI
aiSettings.controlIntro: Laola phetolelo, likarabo tse bohlale, le likarabo tsa ForiaBot.
aiSettings.autoTranslateIncoming: Fetolela melaetsa e kenang ka bohona
aiSettings.showOriginalAlongside: Bontša mongolo oa pele haufi le phetolelo
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: Romella melaetsa e sa tsoa amoheloa (e hloekisitsoeng) ho AI hore e sisinye likarabo tse potlakileng.
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: Ha e buletsoe, litlhahiso tsa AI li tla ba le mantsoe a hlalositsoeng a patiloeng
aiSettings.enableAutoReply: Lumella karabo ea boithatelo ha ke le maqheku
aiSettings.saveFailed: Ho hlolehile ho boloka litlhophiso tsa AI
aiSettings.translateTagged: Ha feela ho @translated kapa ho tšoailoe

accessibilitySettings.title: Phihlello & Litemoso
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Likhetho tsa ho etsa hore Chatforia e be bonolo ntle le ho itšetleha ka molumo.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: E qala ka boholo bo tloaelehileng. Eketsa haeba u rata mongolo o moholo ho litlhophiso tsa phihlello.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Litemoso tsa pono bakeng sa melaetsa & mehala
Bontša lifolakha le ho panya ha sehlooho hore u se ke ua hloloheloa liketso.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Thothomela ha ho na le melaetsa e mecha (ha e tšehetsoa)
Hlahisa ho thothomela ha sesebelisoa ka litemoso.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Flesha skrine ha ho kena mohala
Flesha e khanyang ka bokgutshwane ha mohala o lla.
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Fetolela lintlha tsa lentsoe ka bohona
Hokela mongolo ho melaetsa ea audio eo u e amohelang.
accessibilitySettings.visualAlerts: Litemoso tsa pono bakeng sa melaetsa & mehala
accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Bontša lifolakha le ho panya ha sehlooho hore u se ke ua hloloheloa liketso.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewShort: Thothomela ha ho na le melaetsa e mecha (ha e tšehetsoa)
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewDesc: Hlahisa ho thothomela ha sesebelisoa ka litemoso.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallShort: Flesha skrine ha ho kena mohala
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallDesc: Flesha e khanyang ka bokgutshwane ha mohala o lla.

privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Boloka feela ciphertext ho seva. E tima AI/Phetolelo le ponelopele ea taolo.

peoplePage.searchPlaceholder: Batla ka lebitso la bosoasoi, lebitso, lebitso la mosebelisi, kapa mohala
peoplePage.quickStartDesc: Mekhoa e potlakileng ea ho qala.
peoplePage.searchByPhoneOrUsername: Batla ka mohala / lebitso la mosebelisi
peoplePage.inviteDesc: Arolelana sehokelo sa memo ho qala ho qoqa hang-hang.
peoplePage.getTheAppDesc: Lula u hokahane ka Chatforia bakeng sa iOS le Android.
peoplePage.syncTip: Keletso: Melaetsa ea hau e lula e hokahane ho web le mobile.

randomChat.title: Puisano ka Tšohanyetso
randomChat.description: Kopana le motho e mocha hang-hang. Re tla u bapisa 'me re bule phaposi ea nakoana.
randomChat.saveGuard: Ke lipuisano tsa motho le motho feela tse ka bolokoang
